title: Encountering the Personal God pt 1: How Jesus Rescued Me From the Jehovah's Witness Dungeon
description:
Following up on my conversation with John Vervaeke and J.P. Marceau with the first of two videos about experiences of the Divine. In this video I share a couple of my own personal experiences, including the one that liberated me from the JW cult.
John Vervaeke with Andrew Sweeney https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C42TmeFHNmI
Me on Paul VanderKlay's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
